@graph.name: RNA-RNA interactome data analysis - chira  v1.4.3
@graph.description:
RNA-RNA interactome analysis using ChiRA tool suite

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [RNA-RNA interactome data analysis](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/rna-interactome/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
